name: DISTANCE (itch) (hi rohun, Kirsten-Lee)
description:
Only needs a mouse to play

Find your way 'home.'  The distance counter tells you how far you are from home. Hint: The character always looks toward 'home.'

Best played on the downloaded version with headphones

Entry for the SA Game Jam 2018: theme was escalating possibilities 

Team:

@kirsty_lee0 : art and programming

Amith Ranjith: sound design

Myself: art and programming
